content.title: Changed Api.
content.content: Removed some stuff

content.title: Plugin files.
content.content: Plugin files now end with '.script.js' instead of '.plugin.js'

content.title: Magic classes are removed.
content.content: Remove the 'dr-' magic classes they where to buggy and caused conflicts in client mods

content.title: Fixed crashing.
content.content: Crashes are now fixed after discord changed somestuff

content.title: New command api
content.content: Allows you to add custom slash commands and use custom slash commands

content.title: Duratin bar
content.content: Adds a duration bar to toasts now

content.title: No Results
content.content: Now adds the results icon and text from the search panel.

content.title: No Addons
content.content: Now adds a icon for no addons are found.

content.title: Debugger
content.content: Added back devtools debugger (F8)

content.title: Friend Requests
content.content: Made it so the 'Friend Requests' tab isn't with Discord Re-invisioned settings panel.

content.title: Fixed loading other file types
content.content: Now only supports '.plugin.js' instead of every type.

content.title: Adds require
content.content: Adds require when working in the the main context and native.

content.title: RDT
content.content: React Developer Tools is now built in!

content.title: Duration
content.content: Now states how long the building process took.

content.title: Size
content.content: Now states how big the asar is.

content.title: MIT License.
content.content: This project is now under the MIT license.

content.title: Control addons using plugins.
content.content: You can now get a theme/plugin data and toggle them off and on.

content.title: Custom CSS
content.content: Custom CSS loads instantly now.

content.title: Theming.
content.content: Added a release attribute and a userId attribute to the HTML element.

content.title: jQuery.
content.content: jQuery devtools can now be loaded in.

content.title: Updater.
content.content: New built in updater to download the latest version.

content.title: Theming.
content.content: Theming now supports both the Splash screen and the regular app.

content.title: API.
content.content: Brand new API for plugins to use.

content.title: New Design.
content.content: Brand new UI design.

content.title: Icons.
content.content: Icons are set for one thing and will be used everywhere for that item.
